A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
There's a lot to like for both longtime fans of the franchise\, and newcomers. An exciting ride with plenty of tension and drama.

If you come to the movie with preconceived theories and notions of what will happen\, you may leave disappointed or upset\, but everything that plays out fits the concept of the Star Wars universe as it has been built.

Some of the side stories are somewhat clumsily bolted on\, but they serve their purpose and do not detract from the experience.
